title: My client/Champ select animations are gone
body: I recently logged in on league of legends and started a game, but I could immediately tell something was off. Champselect was looking really bad. All the animations and other things to make it look clean and appealing were gone. I don't why they are gone, or if its a mistake on my part, so I would like to know if any of you know how to enable them again or if you have encountered the same as me. I have tried to initiate a full repair, but it didn't change anything. Not a major issue, I would just like the animations to come back.

replies.body: My animations are back now, so I guess it was just a slip up from riot :)

> My animations are back now, so I guess it was just a slip up from riot :)

This sounds like it could have been related to issues with our settings server we were having earlier today? I think the settings that control this are stored there but I am not 100% on that unfortunately. Let us know if its still happening. If your settings got cleared you might need to set them again :X.
I have this problem since the new update 09/01/2020
my animations have been broken since December. sometimes when I log in they work, and other times they don't.
Same problem here. I checked if I accidently turned on low spec mode, which wasn't, so I tried to turn it on and off again, which also didn't help. Speaking of the low spec mode. Not the client.
I have the same problem. I don't know why either. and the option to enable client animations is gone.
This is happening to me as well. Since December.

The animations on my client are also bugged. It just shows a still image of what the animation would look like as I select my champion. 
It's a bit unappealing, but I just shrugged it off for the time being. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
